text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Hmm?
Something still feels off...
Wait, could that be about Luca's...?

Eh... Amazing...!
You could tell from that gesture...?

I was watching a live video of Ikaruga-san's
performance, and it made me want to dance.

I'm glad it was inspiring for you...!
So, how was Luca?

It was amazing... I couldn't take my eyes off her...
it's like she draws you in...
Ah... like gravitational pull...!

Maybe Ikaruga-san's performance
has a gravitational force of its own...
Ah... that might be true...
Do I have a power that draws everyone in, too...?

Will I acquire it...
through lots of lessons and work...?

Haruki...
about that──

Ah...
Producer-san, please don't say anything...!
I-I'm sorry...

Whether it's comfort, encouragement, or reprimand...
If I heard it now, I feel like all my strength would drain away.
── Right now, I want to keep questioning myself

...Okay, I understand.
But please remember one thing.
That I'm here for you, Haruki.
Anytime you need, please rely on me.
Haha... Yes...!
